thread.title: A hidden gem, great hotel!
thread.title_full: A hidden gem, great hotel! - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: T S
title: A hidden gem, great hotel!
text: I just happened to come across Casablanca Hotel. As I read the great reviews one after another we booked 2 nights. Staff is wonderful, hotel is very clean. We stayed in room 409, very quiet mini suite. We will be back again. Great breakfast, staff so accommodating. Wine & cheese time with piano playing was very relaxing.
